casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana
v.
Michael Scott PAPIZAN No. 2017-K-2028 Supreme Court of Louisiana. October 29, 2018 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, FIRST CIRCUIT, PARISH OF E. BATON ROUGE Denied. GUIDRY, J., would grant.

CLARK, J., would grant.

CRICHTON, J., would grant and assigns reasons.

CRICHTON, J., would grant the State's writ, reverse the lower courts' rulings, and remand to the trial court for further proceedings.
